SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.img_url, c.`name` poster_name, c.avatar_url poster_avatar_url, p.create_at FROM fms_post AS p LEFT JOIN cms_club AS c ON p.poster_id = c.id WHERE p.delete_state = 0 AND p.type = 1
AND p.poster_id = #{clubId}
AND title LIKE concat("%",#{queryParam.keyword},"%")
ORDER BY #{queryParam.sort} DESC

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.img_url, c.`name` poster_name, c.avatar_url poster_avatar_url, p.create_at FROM fms_post AS p LEFT JOIN cms_club AS c ON p.poster_id = c.id WHERE p.delete_state = 0 AND p.type = 1 AND p.id = #{id}

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, p.img_url, u.username poster_name, u.avatar_url poster_avatar_url, p.create_at FROM fms_post AS p LEFT JOIN sys_user AS u ON p.poster_id = u.id WHERE p.delete_state = 0 AND p.type = 0
AND p.poster_id IN ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM cms_user_club_rel AS t1 WHERE t1.club_id = #{clubId} )
ORDER BY create_at DESC
